DOC.brief_summary: Study aim evaluate efficacy 2-month pre-seasonal treatment AllerT 50 µg 100 µg maintenance dose administer previous study AN004T reduce symptom allergic rhinoconjunctivitis 2nd follow birch pollen season .
DOC.brief_title: Follow-up Study AN004T Assess Persistence AllerT Efficacy During 2nd 4th Season After Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: Multicenter , international , parallel-group follow-up study subject randomize treat Study AN004T ( AllerT 100 µg , AllerT 50 µg , placebo ) follow 2nd , appropriate , 3rd 4th birch pollen season study ( still double-blind 1st year , open-label 2nd 3rd year ) .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Any subject randomize AN004T trial receive least one injection 2 . Any subject inform provide signed consent participate trial willing follow plan trial assessment 1 . Any subject receive specific immunotherapy birch pollen tree pollen mix include birch pollen time since AN004T Visit 1 2 . Any subject intending travel birch pollen season outside birch pollination area 7 consecutive day 3 . Any subject unable unwilling record allergy symptom medication daily follow birch pollen season use electronic diary device 4 . Any subject cover medical insurance 5 . Any subject receive immunosuppressive medication within 4 week prior inclusion , plan use trial period 6 . Any subject receive systemic local antihistamine , oral inhaled corticosteroid anti depressant medication antihistamine effect within 2 week prior inclusion 7 . Any subject use investigational nonregistered drug , vaccine , medical device within 4 week prior inclusion , plan use treatment trial period
